description:
Tree works in front and rear gardens subject to Islington No.1 TPO 1961.  Works: Front:  Sycamore (T93): Deadwood.         Acacia   (T92): Crown lift six metres, clear lamp by                         two metres, crown thin 35%, cut back                         to clear building by two metres,                         remove horizontal laterals growing                         directly across house, deadwood. 

 Rear:   Sycamore (T88): Crown lift five metres, crown thin                         35%, deadwood.         Sycamore (T89): Crown lift five metres, crown thin                         35%, deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
